Sphero Android SDK 2.0

Packages
orbotix.achievement Interact with SpheroWorld achievements
orbotix.macro Macros are executed on the robot.
orbotix.robot.base RobotProvider & associated lower level API commands
orbotix.robot.sensor Sensor Data Objects -Use Sphero to configure Sensors
orbotix.sphero Control Sphero the robot subsystems
orbotix.view.calibration CalibrationView for calibrating the 'forward' direction of the Sphero
orbotix.view.connection SpheroConnectionView is an easy way to discover and connect to an already Paired Sphero
